K10sf18_sc:eno89_3_0: \\\++ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ tac ca bhagavatā uddiṣṭam avibhaktaṁ \\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_2_3_0: \\\++ sapratighaṁ ucyate bhadaṁta dharmā bāhyam āyatanam ++\\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_2_4_0: \\\sarvaṁ ca sarvam astīti sarvadharmāmś ca pṛcchati brahmaṇo bhikṣu \\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_2_5_0: \\\+ | ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni katamāni ṣaṭ rūpaṁ bāhyam. ++\\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_3_1_0: \\\ dharmāṁś ca pṛcchati brāhmaṇo bhikṣur ānandaḥ śāstā bhikṣu u +++
K10sf18_sc:eno89_3_2_0: \\\? ṭ cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ śrotraṁ ghrānaṁ jihvā kāyo +\\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_3_3_0: \\\? bdo rasaḥ spraṣṭavyo dharmo bāhyam āyatanam || ṣaḍ vijñāṇa \\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_3_5_0: \\\ saṁsparśajā vedanā || ṣaḍ ime saṁjñākāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣu +\\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_4_2_0: \\\? ṣṭavyāvekṣaḥ dharmāvekṣa || ṣaḍ imāni cetakhilaṁ mṛkṣa + \\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_4_3_0: \\\? dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ sopādānīyāḥ cetaḥkhilaṁ mrakṣa vastu\\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_4_4_0: \\\? stunā || cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ anityam atītam anāgataṁ kaḥ \\\
K10sf18_sc:eno89_4_5_0: \\\ nandati pratyupannasya cakṣuṣo nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya\\\
